channel.title: [317 Delta] slayer in quest tab?
channel.description: how do i make it say what monster and how many of the monsters left you need to kill in the quest tab,iv already tried [code]"+GetNpcName+"[/code] for what monster you need to attack and doesn't work. also what doesn't work is [code]"+taskAmount+"[/code] for how many monsters left to kill. -please tell me the code for them-
